data.comment: The match has started.
Paranaense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 1, Raphael Claus awards the away team a throw-in.
Vasco da Gama drive upfield and Martin Benitez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Paranaense defender.
Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
Paranaense's Richard is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 3, Neto Borges (Vasco da Gama) has received a yellow card from Raphael Claus.
Richard is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Fabio Augusto Luciano Da Silva is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Raphael Claus signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Paranaense's half.
In the minute 6, Vasco da Gama's Yago Pikachu breaks free at São Januario. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
Fabio Augusto Luciano Da Silva (Paranaense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 7, Goal! German Cano gives Vasco da Gama a 1-0 lead in Rio de Janeiro.
That's a fine assist from Martin Benitez.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 10, Fabio Augusto Luciano Da Silva is back on his feet again.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Geuvanio gets his shot on target but fails to score for Paranaense.
Raphael Claus awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 14, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Paranaense.
The match at São Januario has been interrupted briefly for a check on German Cano, who is down injured.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
In the minute 21, Important block from the Vasco da Gama defence as Leo Cittadini fires in a strike for Paranaense.
Paranaense have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
Paranaense are pushing forward but Leo Cittadini's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 22, Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
German Cano returns to the field for Vasco da Gama after picking up a slight injury.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 24, Vasco da Gama drive forward but Ygor Catatau is judged offside.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Paranaense.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 27, Martin Benitez of Vasco da Gama gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 28, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Paranaense in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 30, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 34, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Paranaense.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
In Rio de Janeiro Vasco da Gama attack through Fellipe Bastos. The finish is off target, however.
Raphael Claus awards Paranaense a goal kick.
In the minute 38, Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Paranaense territory.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Raphael Claus.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 41, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Attention is being given to Vasco da Gama’s Fellipe Bastos and play has been suspended briefly.
Paranaense are coming forward and Geuvanio gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Vasco da Gama's Fellipe Bastos looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Ball safe as Paranaense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 45, Raphael Claus awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Bissoli for Paranaense drives towards goal at São Januario. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Paranaense needs to be cautious. Vasco da Gama have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In Rio de Janeiro Vasco da Gama drive forward through Neto Borges. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Raphael Claus blows to end the first-half.
Bruno Gomes is replacing Martin Benitez for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Ramon Menezes (Vasco da Gama) is making a second substitution, with Cayo Tenorio replacing Ygor Catatau.
In the minute 46, The second-half is underway at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 47, Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Talles Magno for Vasco da Gama gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
Vasco da Gama's Talles Magno gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 60, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Paranaense have a goal kick.
Can Paranaense capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 63, Paranaense drives forward and Geuvanio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Can Paranaense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vasco da Gama's half?
Ramon Menezes is making the team's third substitution at São Januario with Ribamar replacing German Cano.
In the minute 64, The home team have replaced Fellipe Bastos with Bruno Cesar. This is the fourth substitution made today by Ramon Menezes.
Paranaense to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Paranaense.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Goal kick for Paranaense at São Januario.
Raphael Claus awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 69, Paranaense's Geuvanio misses with an attempt on goal.
Raphael Claus awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
Jaime Alvarado is on a sub for Richard for Paranaense.
In the minute 70, Pedrinho is replacing Fabio Augusto Luciano Da Silva for Paranaense at São Januario.
Eduardo Maciel de Barros is making the team's third substitution at São Januario with Bruno Leite replacing Bissoli.
In Rio de Janeiro, Marcio Azevedo of Paranaense is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 71, Talles Magno for Vasco da Gama is whistled offside.
Christian (Paranaense) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Paranaense.
In the minute 72, Throw-in for Paranaense in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Can Paranaense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
The away team have replaced Marcio Azevedo with Abner Vinicius. This is the fourth substitution made today by Eduardo Maciel de Barros.
In the minute 74, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Paranaense close to the penalty box.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 77, Pedrinho of Paranaense smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ball goes out of play for a Paranaense goal kick.
Lucho Gonzalez is replacing Lucas Halter for the away team.
In the minute 82, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama at São Januario.
In the minute 86, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Paranaense in their own half.
Vasco da Gama make their fifth substitution with Carlinhos replacing Talles Magno.
In the minute 87, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama are in shooting range from this free kick.
Geuvanio (Paranaense) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Paranaense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Paranaense are caught offside.
Free kick for Paranaense in the half of Vasco da Gama.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Paranaense's Christian gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Vasco da Gama defender.
Raphael Claus signals a Paranaense throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Free kick in a good position for Vasco da Gama!
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Raphael Claus awards the away team a throw-in.
Raphael Claus signals a free kick to Paranaense in their own half.
Raphael Claus signals a throw-in for Paranaense, close to Vasco da Gama's area.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
